TopicTitle: Kerbal Alarm Clock shows all times in seconds

Articles.Content: Well the title says it all.  For no apparent reason Kerbal Alarm Clock is now displaying all times in seconds.  I must have inadvertently done something but I can't find what it is.  I do have the latest version. Any ideas on how I can get back to the normal display?  Many thanks.

Hi,

maybe this helps somebody as I ran into this problem, too.
You can find that under settings ==> All Alarms (firs Tab) ==> Plugin Preferences ==> Time format

On 4/10/2020 at 1:07 AM, HangmansJoke said:

Hi,

maybe this helps somebody as I ran into this problem, too.

Big thanks even if a bit old
